participant_1.background:
I'm not into fortune tellers, but I'm really interested in my family history.
I celebrate my birthday in a way that is not weather dependent.
i love disney movies.
i have epilepsy.
I can't seem to avoid tripping over my own feet.

participant_2.background:
I love to watch romantic comedies with my family because they make us laugh and feel good.
I usually start my day with a workout to get my body moving and my mind sharp.
I grew up in the Midwest, where Christmas is a big deal.
I remember spending hours reading books in the library with my mom when I was a kid.
I've had to give up a lot of my friends to pursue my dream of filmmaking.

content.text: Hi, I'm [name]. It's nice to meet you.
It's nice to meet you too! What are your interests?
I love to watch romantic comedies with my family. They always make us laugh and feel good.
That sounds like a great way to spend time with your family. Do you have any favorite movies?
I love all of the classics, like Pretty Woman and Sleepless in Seattle. But I also enjoy some of the newer ones, like Crazy Rich Asians and Last Christmas.
Those are all great movies! I love Pretty Woman. What kind of books do you like to read?
I love reading all kinds of books, but I especially enjoy historical fiction and romance novels. I also love reading books about my family history.
That's really cool! I love learning about my family history too. What's the most interesting thing you've learned about your family?
I recently found out that my great-great-grandfather was a pirate!
That's amazing! I would love to hear more about him.
I'll tell you all about him next time we talk.
Great! I can't wait to hear more.
